00137   std::string getContigName() const { assert(m_align.size()); return m_align[0].align.Name; }
00138 
00142   int getMaxMapq() const { 
00143     int m = -1;
00144     for (auto& i : m_align)
00145       if (i.align.MapQuality > m)
00146         m = i.align.MapQuality;
00147     return m;
00148   }
00149 
00153   int getMinMapq() const { 
00154     int m = 1000;
00155     for (auto& i : m_align)
00156       if (i.align.MapQuality < m)
00157         m = i.align.MapQuality;
00158     return m;
00159   }

00241 struct PlottedRead {
00242 
00243   int pos;
00244   std::string seq;
00245   std::string info;
00246 
00247   bool operator<(const PlottedRead& pr) const {
00248     return (pos < pr.pos);
00249   }
00250 
00251 };
00252 
00253 typedef std::vector<PlottedRead> PlottedReadVector;
00254 
00255 struct PlottedReadLine {
00256 
00257   std::vector<PlottedRead*> read_vec;
00258   int available = 0;
00259   int contig_len = 0;
00260 
00261   void addRead(PlottedRead *r) {
00262     read_vec.push_back(r);
00263     available = r->pos + r->seq.length() + 5;
00264   }
00265 
00266   bool readFits(PlottedRead &r) {
00267     return (r.pos >= available);
00268   }
00269 
00270   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const PlottedReadLine &r) {
00271     int last_loc = 0;
00272     for (auto& i : r.read_vec) {
00273       assert(i->pos - last_loc >= 0);
00274       out << std::string(i->pos - last_loc, ' ') << i->seq;
00275       last_loc = i->pos + i->seq.length();
00276     }
00277     int name_buff = r.contig_len - last_loc;
00278     assert(name_buff < 10000);
00279     out << std::string(max(name_buff, 5), ' ');
00280     for (auto& i : r.read_vec) { // add the data
00281       out << i->info << ",";
00282     }
00283     return out;
00284   }
00285 
00286 };
00287 
00288 typedef std::vector<PlottedReadLine> PlottedReadLineVector;
